plains.name: Arborius
plains.location: Will pop out of bush when you touch the right bush
plains.extra-info: when beaten, you get a flyer with a phone number to call poison control - 1-800-9909-0989 AND a ban hammer
powers: pops up poisonous tree trunks in random places across the map

desert.name: Sceletrion
desert.extra-info: when beaten, you get a mp3 player, AND a telephone

swamp.name: Fungron
swamp.location: on single huge tree in swamp
swamp.extra-info: when beaten, you get an sd card that contains an mp3 file to play distorted trance music for racing game
powers: smashes you with arm that it occasionally can grow

snowy_tundra.name: Dream
snowy_tundra.location: under rock, you have to find right one
snowy_tundra.extra-info: when beaten, you get a portal summoner that brings you to the mama dimension
powers: throws ender pearls at you to teleport you closer to him
throws blaze rods to set you on fire
weaknesses: distorted trance music for racing game
